abilities.shoot:
Shoot - the shooter can give a double shoot of: <damage> damage.
Remaining shoots: <bullets>.
Range: <range>.
abilities.armor: Armor - limits the maximum damage from a single attack that Destroyer can receive to: <max_damage>.
abilities.grenade: Grenade - deals area damage of: <damage> for main target and half of that around. It can be used only once per battle.
abilities.arrow:
Arrow - the commander can shoot an arrow within range of <range> and deal damage of <damage>.
It also applied effect of viewfinder.
This effect allows commander to target these units regardless of the distance.
Viewfinder lasts for <viewfinder_duration> turns.
abilities.aura_of_immunity:
Aura Of Immunity - giant offers a nearby allies aure
which apply damage reduction of <damage_reduction_for_friends>.
Giant also has constant damage reduction of <damage_reduction_for_owner>.
abilities.blow_the_ax: Blow The Ax - deals damage of: <damage> to single target.
abilities.counterattack:
Counterattack - native performs a counterattack if
the attacker is within his range.
Counterattack deals <damage>. It works only once per turn.
abilities.cure:
Cure - heals an ally by <healing_amount_per_turn> health and then the same amount every turn for <healing_duration> turns.
Magic cost: <power_cost>.
abilities.dodge:
Dodge - samurai avoids every third attack.
Received attacks from the last dodge: <counter>.
abilities.drain:
Drain - deals damage of: <damage> and heals native by: <drain_amount> regardless of dealt damage.
This skill can heal over the base level of health.
abilities.giant_blow:
Giant Blow - deals damage of <damage>.
Every third attack additionally causes that the enemy can attack
only the giant for one turn.
abilities.giant_ram:
Giant Ram - the giant will accelerate and attack all units in his path.
Damage: <damage>.
This ability can be used only once per battle.
abilities.hypnosis:
Hypnosis - causes that the enemy unit will not be able to make a move
in the next turn.
It can be used only once per battle.
abilities.immortality:
Immortality - when the health of the warrior drops to zero
the warrior becomes immortal for one more turn.
abilities.invisibility:
Invisibility - saberhand becomes invisible and can't receive any damage
through <duration> turns.
This ability can be used only once per battle
abilities.purification:
Purification - eliminates all removable negative effects from the unit.
Magic cost: <power_cost>.
abilities.dragon_skin: Dragon Skin - reduce damage from magical attack by <magic_damage_reduction>.
abilities.flame_burning:
Flame Burning - deals damage of: <damage>.
If enemy has magic power it also burn <burn_magic_power> of it
and deal additional damage equal to this amount.
abilities.moveable:
Move - standard way to move.
Range: <range>.
abilities.warrior_blow:
Warrior Blow - deals the more damage the less warrior has health.
Base damage is <damage>.
abilities.teleport:
Teleport - teleports the droid to a selected place on the map.
It can be used only once per battle.
abilities.sword_blow:
Sword Blow - deals damage of: <damage> to all units around the samurai.
If the samurai hits minimum tree units he performs an additional blow.
abilities.surroundings:
Surroundings - spider get <damage_reduction> damage reduction for each enemy
 in his neighborhood.Minimum damage is <min_damage>.
abilities.stone_skin:
Stone Skin - with each received attack golem
increase his damage reduction by <reduction_increase_amount> points.
Current damage reduction: <damage_reduction>.
abilities.spider_web:
Spider Web - spider shoot his web within range of <range>.
Web deal <damage> damage, attracts the opponent and apply slow to him.
abilities.jaw_spider:
Jaw Spider - deals <damage> damage.
If enemy is under Spider Web effect it deals <bonus_for_spider_web_effect> additional damage.
abilities.lightning:
Lightning - mark enemy with lightning target.
In next turn lightning will hit enemy and deal <damage> damage.
This spell cost <power_cost> magic power.
Actual magic power: <power>.
abilities.sabers:
Sabers - saberhand can acquire several neighboring targets
and deal each of them damage of: <damage>.
abilities.mortar_thrower:
Mortar Thrower - fires area missle to range <range> which deals <base_damage> of damage.
If Rocket Launcher was used earlier Mortar Thrower gain <rocket_change_bonus> additional damage.
abilities.rocket_launcher:
Rocket Launcher - fires missle to range <range> which deals <base_damage> + <distance_bonus> damage
for each unit of range.
If Mortar Thrower was used earlier Rocket Launcher gain <rocket_change_bonus> additional damage.
